name: Maze Walkthrough
description:
An interactive virtual maze built by assembling 3D reproductions of various corridors from science fiction films. The environment of an empty video-game: there is no way out, no action, no narrative and no other objective than the exploration of the maze itself.

In collaboration with Guillermo Cle, Carlos Fdez. Rovira, Roc Jiménez de Cisneros and Aitor Román.

With the support of BCN Producció '14. La Capella, Institut de Cultura de Barcelona.

2014
